info.task: navigate backwards to filled in collapsed combobox
info.title: Navigate backwards to a filled in, collapsed combobox

setupScript.name: moveFocusAfterComboboxAndSetValueToAlabama
setupScript.description: sets focus on a link after the Combobox, and sets the combobox value to 'Alabama'

user: Navigate to the Combobox. Note: it should be in the collapsed state. You may need to press certain commands (such as Control+Option+Left) multiple times to hear all information relating to the combobox.
instructions.raw: Navigate to the Combobox. Note: it should be in the collapsed state. You may need to press certain commands (such as Control+Option+Left) multiple times to hear all information relating to the combobox.
instructions.mode: Toggle Quick Nav OFF by pressing the Left Arrow and Right Arrow keys at the same time.

assertions.expectation: Name of the combobox ('State') is conveyed
State of the combobox (collapsed) is conveyed
Text of the selected option ('Alabama') is conveyed
The ability to enter or edit text is conveyed
State of the text in the input (selected) is conveyed
The presence of autocomplete behavior is conveyed
